mapper.select:
SELECT s.script_id, s.script_name, u.nick_name, s.submit_info, CASE s.script_status WHEN 0 THEN '待审核' WHEN 1 THEN '已审核' WHEN 2 THEN '被驳回' END AS script_status, update_time FROM emergency_script s, emergency_user u
( s.script_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scriptName},'%') OR s.script_user LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scriptUser},'%') )
s.script_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scriptName},'%')
s.script_user LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scriptUser},'%')
AND ((s.is_public = 0 AND s.script_user = #{scriptUser}) OR s.is_public = 1)
AND s.script_user = u.user_name
